meanings.definition: The seam on the inside of a garment that runs from the crotch to the bottom of the leg.
meanings.sent1: She checked the inseams of the pants to ensure they fit properly.
meanings.sent2: The tailor carefully sewed the inseams of the trousers for a perfect fit.
meanings.sent3: The inseams of the jeans decided to have a race down the leg.
meanings.sent4: The inseams of the dress held the fabric together like a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The inseams of the shorts were like a hidden path inside the garment.

meanings.definition: To measure the inseam of a pair of pants.
meanings.sent1: He inseams every pair of jeans before putting them on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She will inseam the trousers to determine the correct size.
meanings.sent3: Inseaming the pants became his favorite task at the clothing store.
meanings.sent4: The tailor carefully inseamed the new pair of pants with precision.
meanings.sent5: Inseaming the jeans felt like unraveling a mystery to find the perfect fit.
